payload.title: Why Do We Drink Green Beer On St. Patrick’s Day?
payload.overview: St. Patrick’s day is known for drinking green beer, way too much Guinness, partying with friends, and singing along to Irish music even though you don’t know the words. We know that we drink copious amounts of alcohol and many pints of green beer on St. Patty’s Day, but have you ever wondered why?

payload.title: St. Patrick’s Day Beer Drinking Game – Adult Scavenger Hunt
payload.overview: Looking for a fun drinking game to play on St. Patrick’s Day? Here is a list of St. Patrick’s Day scavenger hunt drinking game “rules”. Happy St. Paddy’s Day, beer lovers!

Continue reading to find the right beer for you.
